title: Evelynn Nerfs
body:
I don't know if anyone knows this, but Evelynn is bonkers with electrocute. She does not fall off anymore with her damage.

Void+Sorc's+Lich Bane+Charm Boost allow her to easily take 70-80% of a squishy's HP through Maw in one ability.

Granted, if a squishy gets charmed, they should die but that much damage and a charm on top makes resistance/reaction impossible. You need a QSS and Maw to survive before you get ulted or attacked again. Her damage does not fall off anymore. 

She's really strong so nerfs are possible.

The issue with Evelynn is her high damage - one shot immediately leading to an ultimate that you cant stop.
